Reviews.Content: returned daytona beach spent five nights ok actually supposed 7 nights moved orlando floors clean understand sand bathroom master bedroom tiny couldnt shut door standing toilet counter unit beachy looking patio door onto balcony overlooking ocean thats spent morning drinking coffee lacking security officers friendliest employee encountered checking told havent released call wasnt welcoming phone calls 2 3 times day attendance sales meetings irritated told start phone calls morning evening notes stuck door morning reason theyre told start respect reason return overall average location cant recommend honestly
